DataElement.preferredName: Medical Device Manufacturer Street Address Name
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Medical device - any machinery designed to aid diagnostic and medical therapies. Medical device has to be designed with rigorous safety standards. There are several basic types of medical devices: life support equipment used to maintain a patient's body functions; therapeutic equipment; monitors and detectors to measure the indexes of a patient's state; imagine machines and laboratory equipment used with diagnostic and status monitoring purposes. In insurance parlance, the term is usually synonymous with assistive device, although it may include medical supplies._The act of making something (a product) from raw materials.:_The street name and building number where a person or organization can be found._the street name component of an address.

In insurance parlance, the term is usually synonymous with assistive device, although it may include medical supplies._The act of making something (a product) from raw materials.:_The street name and building number where a person or organization can be found.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Medical device - any machinery designed to aid diagnostic and medical therapies. Medical device has to be designed with rigorous safety standards. There are several basic types of medical devices: life support equipment used to maintain a patient's body functions; therapeutic equipment; monitors and detectors to measure the indexes of a patient's state; imagine machines and laboratory equipment used with diagnostic and status monitoring purposes. In insurance parlance, the term is usually synonymous with assistive device, although it may include medical supplies.

Concepts.definition: Any physical object that is useful for prevention, diagnosis, monitoring, or treatment of disease or other conditions.

Property.preferredDefinition: The act of making something (a product) from raw materials.:The street name and building number where a person or organization can be found.

Concepts.definition: The act of making something (a product) from raw materials.
The street name and building number where a person or organization is located.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: all components of an address, including building number, street name and type, city, state, postal code, and country.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the street name component of an address.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the management of a research protocol and its case report forms.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A language unit by which a person or thing is known.

Concepts.definition: A word or group of words indicating the identity of a person usually consisting of a first (personal) name and a last (family) name with an optional middle name. In some cultural traditions the family name comes first.
